description: Enhanced blueprint for extracting comprehensive completion data from hydraulic fracturing reports including well details, perforation data, stimulation parameters, and water usage

Proppant_Volume.instruction: Extract the total proppant volume pumped for the stage in pounds from the completion summary

Average_Rate.instruction: Extract the average pumping rate in barrels per minute (bpm) for the stage from the completion summary

Maximum_Rate.instruction: Extract the maximum pumping rate in barrels per minute (bpm) for the stage from the completion summary

Average_Pressure.instruction: Extract the average treating pressure in psi for the stage from the completion summary

Maximum_Pressure.instruction: Extract the maximum treating pressure in psi for the stage from the completion summary

API_Number.instruction: Extract the API well number from the wellbore diagram or header section

Well_Name.instruction: Extract the complete well name including lease name and well number (e.g., Smith #1H) from the wellbore diagram or header

Operator.instruction: Extract the operating company name from the report header or wellbore diagram

Field.instruction: Extract the field name where the well is located from the header section

County_Parish.instruction: Extract the county or parish name from the well location information

State.instruction: Extract the state where the well is located from the header information

Spud_Date.instruction: Extract the spud date from the report header

Measured_Depth.instruction: Extract the measured depth from the report header

Product_Type.instruction: Extract whether this is a oil producing type or gas producing type

Size.instruction: Extract the casing diameter size from the casing record (i.e. 5 1/2)

Weight.instruction: Extract the casing weight from the casing record

Depth.instruction: Extract the depth to for the casing record

Top_Perf.instruction: Extract the top (shallowest) perforation depth in feet MD from the perforation summary or wellbore diagram

Bottom_Perf.instruction: Extract the bottom (deepest) perforation depth in feet MD from the perforation summary or wellbore diagram

Source_Name.instruction: Extract the name or identifier of the water source from the water supply section

Supply_Type.instruction: Extract the water supply type (public, private, surface water, groundwater) from the water supply section

Volume_Used.instruction: Extract the total volume of water used from this source in barrels from the water supply summary

Source_Location.instruction: Extract the latitude/longitude coordinates or location description of the water source

Well_Information.instruction: Extract all well identification and location information from the report header and wellbore diagram

Perforation_Data.instruction: Extract perforation interval data for each stage from the wellbore diagram, including top/bottom depths and stage numbers

Water_Sources.instruction: Extract water supply information from the Hydraulic Fracture Stimulation section including source names, types, volumes, and locations

Completion_Summary.instruction: Extract the completion data from the wellbore diagram page for each stage in the fracturing job

Casing_Summary.instruction: Extract the casing details from the report header page.
